name: Goldberg Square
description:
This is an open-ended puzzle game, the only thing you can do is to put down a kind of special made squares, to form a system that pushes balls into the hole.

这是一个开放式的解谜游戏，你需要用一种特制的方块来组成各种各样的系统，把场上的球推到洞里。

It's an early stage demo features bugs, lacking of polish and so on. All levels are open in this version, to get a better experience, beat level in designated order is recommanded. Feel free to try out levels of mutant balls once you've understand the basics of the GOLDBERG SQUARE.

这是一个早期的演示版本，带有许多漏洞，缺乏优化等问题。本版本所有关卡都是开放的，但为了获得更好的体验，建议按指定的顺序游玩关卡。一旦你了解戈德堡方块的基本知识，便可以游玩变种球的关卡。
